urls.title: What is the requirement for Lithium Batteries?
urls.description: What is the requirement for Lithium Batteries? Spare / Loose Lithium Batteries (including power banks), shall only be accepted as carry-on baggage or cabin baggage as per below table Can't find the answer you are looking for? Ask us through one of the channels

data.text: @IyaMangga >>You may check out the link provided for further clarification on bringing the power bank on board:  [https://t.co/Lp6PTcSAWo]. -QZ

@IyaMangga >>Do note that each power-bank capacity should not exceed more than 100wh. Whereas the 100wh-160wh capacity power bank depends on security checks where they have the final decision on this type of item.>>

@IyaMangga Hi, @IyaMangga. Thank you for contacting us. Please be informed that you are allowed to bring the portable fan to your cabin or check-in baggage. Kindly note that a maximum limit of two (2) power banks is allowed per passenger and the item can only be accepted as cabin baggage.>>
